# Império Bebidas e Conveniência - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Mobile-first React Native app with Expo for Império Bebidas e Conveniência - a beverage store.

## Design Guidelines
- Mobile-first, portrait orientation (9:16)
- iOS Human Interface Guidelines (Apple HIG)
- One-hand optimized - interactive elements in lower third
- Color Palette:
  - Black: #000000 (background, primary text)
  - White: #FFFFFF (surface, secondary text)
  - Gold: #D4AF37 (accent, highlights)
  - Gray: #666666 (muted, tertiary text)

## Tech Stack
- React Native + Expo
- TypeScript
- Expo Router (file-based routing)
- NativeWind (TailwindCSS for React Native)
- Google Maps integration
- WhatsApp integration
- AsyncStorage for local data

## Code Style
- Use TypeScript for all files
- Use functional components with hooks
- Use NativeWind classes for styling
- Follow mobile-first responsive design
- Ensure accessibility (contrast, touch targets 48x48pt)

## Project Structure
- `app/` - Expo Router screens
- `components/` - Reusable components
- `constants/` - Colors, config, data
- `types/` - TypeScript type definitions
- `assets/` - Images, icons, logo
- `utils/` - Helper functions
- `hooks/` - Custom React hooks
